title: Two sermons lately preached at the Assizes in St. Maries Church in Leicester the former March 23, 1670, the latter July 27, 1671 / by Robert Harrison.
author: Harrison, Robert, fl. 1648-1672.
publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Tho. Sawbridge,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
